overview: This microbudget indie film, Lightning in a Bottle, stars Jenna Bowers as Elysia, a college graduate recruited by a secret organization that protects a small Indiana town from dark forces. When people in the town start going missing, it's up to Greg (Josh Baker), the group's leader, and Ambrose (Eric T. Schroeder), a backwards living wizard, to stop the person or creature behind it.
title: Lightning in a Bottle
